file_insights.changes: Added PageTransition wrapper component to all route elements
file_insights.impact: Enables page transition animations across the entire application routing structure
file_insights.complexity: Low - straightforward wrapping of existing components

patterns_discovered.description: All page components are wrapped with PageTransition component in a uniform manner
patterns_discovered.significance: Ensures consistent transition behavior across all routes

patterns_discovered.description: Nested routes maintain their parent-child relationships while adding transition effects
patterns_discovered.significance: Demonstrates proper use of React Router's nested routing with animation wrapper

patterns_discovered.description: PageTransition wrapper applied both to public routes (login) and protected routes (dashboard, projects, etc.)
patterns_discovered.significance: Comprehensive coverage of all route types for consistent UX

gotchas_discovered.issue: No conditional logic in PageTransition wrapper application
gotchas_discovered.context: All routes receive transitions regardless of route type or component complexity
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: May want to consider if redirect route (Navigate) should be wrapped or if performance optimization is needed for heavy components

gotchas_discovered.issue: Deep nesting with transitions on parent and child routes
gotchas_discovered.context: ProjectDetailPage is wrapped, and all its nested child routes (equipment, materials, etc.) are also wrapped
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Could potentially cause double animation effects or performance issues; may need to verify intended behavior

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully integrated PageTransition component into the entire App.tsx routing structure
approach_outcome.execution_quality: Clean and comprehensive - all 16 route elements wrapped consistently
approach_outcome.validation_needed: Runtime testing to confirm transition animations work correctly without visual glitches or performance issues

recommendations.suggestion: Verify visual behavior of nested PageTransition wrapping (parent and child routes) to ensure no double animation effects
recommendations.rationale: Nested transitions could create unintended animation sequences

recommendations.suggestion: Consider monitoring animation performance with heavy components like ProjectDetailPage to ensure smooth transitions
recommendations.rationale: Multiple animations on complex component hierarchies could impact performance

recommendations.suggestion: Consider creating a route configuration object/array to reduce repetitive wrapping syntax
recommendations.rationale: Would improve maintainability and reduce visual clutter in the routes definition

recommendations.suggestion: Evaluate if the redirect route (Navigate) should have PageTransition wrapper or remain unwrapped
recommendations.rationale: Root path redirects may not need animation effects
